about_the_game:
Zombie Possum Games Inc, in collaboration with Darwin's Toys Inc, is excited to bring the Empire Builder series of board games to your PC. As fans of these games, we at Zombie Possum Games Inc sought more time in our busy lives to enjoy them. To our surprise, we couldn't find any playable versions online using the services that we love like Steam and Xbox. That changes now. With the release of Empire Builder - Europe and the license to offer all other installments in the franchise, we are partnering with Darwin's Toys to publish the latest versions on Steam, iOS, Xbox, and other platforms.

If you are an avid train gamer in the physical space, we hope you will enjoy our adaption of the board game to the digital game space.

Features to be included in the initial release include the following:
All of the game's resources, cities, demand cards and event cards, fully implemented in the digital game.
A select number of popular house rules. (TBD)
2-6 player multiplayer between Steam friends and those with a ZPG account.
A user interface that is designed to make the game play of the boardgame faster. Our goal is to get 4 player game play down to under an hour or 45 minutes for experienced players.
Tournament rules.
Current tournament approved map coming soon for the physical board game. (published by Darwin's Toys)

2009 map, cards and rules.

Planned features for after release.
iOS support
Xbox and controller support.
Additional languages.

This is the first in a series of Empire Builder games that we plan to release alongside Darwin's Toys' re-release of the physical board games. As avid players ourselves, this is a passion project; one we hope allows us to be able to play with our friends when getting together in person is less than ideal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit or greater
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 10* series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit or greater
  • Processor: 11th gen 1.5Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 20* series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
